Title: Cofun Gal no Coffy Campus Life
Description: ['The sequel to ', Cofun Gal no Coffy (TV), ', it takes place 3 year later via a college campus life comedy about 20-year-old college student Coffy, her boyfriend Nintoku-kun, her childhood friend Daniel, her love rival Dorothy, and Okehazama-sensei, who quit being a teacher and became the chief of the college mart.']
